name: 尤信程
objective: 本科目旨在介紹計算機系統之基礎觀念以及應用。主要內容包括：1.計算機系統簡介 2 .資料的表示法、數字系統 3.周邊裝置及儲存體 4.作業系統 5.檔案與資料庫 6.資料通訊與計算機網路 7. 新興技術介紹
schedule:
Week 1.   Administration announcement
Week 2,3. Binary values and number systems
Week 4,5. Data representation
Week 6.   Computing components
Week 7,8. Low-level programming languages
Week 9    MT
Week 10.  MT sol 
Week 11,12 Operating Systems
Week 13   File systems
Week 14,15 Computer network
Week 17 Web & security issues
Week 18 Final exam
scorePolicy:
HW 10 %
MT 40 %
Final 45 %
Presentation 5 %
Participation up to 5 %
materials: Compter Science : Illuminated, Dale & Lewis, 5th/6th ed.
